summary: As a series of strange and violent events begin to occur, an alcoholic policeman realizes that he has been turned into a werewolf as part of a larger plan.
cast: Leo Fafard|Amy Matysio|Sarah Lind|Corinne Conley|Jesse Moss|Jonathan Cherry|Aidan Devine|James Whittingham|Ryland Alexander|Jason Shabatoski|Lyndon Bray|Victor Lam|Cheryl Mazil|Laura Abramsen|Josh Strait|Alison Dean|Peter Scoular|Jay Robertson|Brian Dueck|Glenn LaPointe|Graham Bell|Michael Maslany|George Grassick|Lowell Dean|Noush Habeebkutty|Rob Hoskins|Hugh Patterson
title: WolfCop
